actions_performed: Strategic Decomposition: Initiated post-pilot quality audit.
Integrated Audit: Verified structural integrity of pilot-run-1 and pilot-run-2 summaries.
Memory Promotion: Initiated promotion of Unified Organizational Model artifacts to 'validated' stage.
learnings: Automation of the quality gate reduces the manual overhead of specialist handoffs.
The formal evolution protocol ensures no undocumented patterns enter the core repository.
